description: LG smartphone users can use the LG Backup application to back up their phone's applications, calendar entries, contacts, settings, and messages in an LBF file. When they do, their MMS messages are saved in the LBF file, as a series of PDU files. These files are named 0.pdu , 1.pdu , 2.pdu , and so on.
Using a hex editor and a complicated series of instructions , users can extract PDU files from their LBF file.
